definitions.description: A deposit account holding that allows the holder to make deposits and withdrawals through financial holding instruments. An account can be interest bearing

constantValues: A deposit account holding that allows the holder to make deposits and withdrawals through financial holding instruments. An account can be interest bearing

members.name: FH_AccountId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: Required name field.

members.name: accountingClassification
members.description: Indicates whether the financial holding is an asset or a liability.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'accountingClassification_display' is added to the 'FHAccount' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'accountingClassification'
supportingAttribute.name: accountingClassification_display

constantValues: Indicates whether the financial holding is an asset or a liability.

members.name: availableBalance
members.description: Available balance on the account.

members.name: availablebalance_Base
members.description: Value of the available balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the available balance in base currency.

members.name: availableBalance_default
members.description: Available balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Available balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: averageBalance
members.description: The average balance in the account calculated over a chosen period of time by the bank.

constantValues: The average balance in the account calculated over a chosen period of time by the bank.

members.name: averagebalance_Base
members.description: Value of the average balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the average balance in base currency.

members.name: averageBalance_default
members.description: Average balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Average balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: balance
members.description: The balance or value of the financial holding in the original currency of the financial holding.

constantValues: The balance or value of the financial holding in the original currency of the financial holding.

members.name: balance_Base
members.description: Value of the balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the balance in base currency.

members.name: balanceDefault
members.description: Balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: balanceExchangerate
members.description: Exchange rate between the transaction currency of the financial holding and the default currency (1 unit of transaction currency = X units of default currency).

constantValues: Exchange rate between the transaction currency of the financial holding and the default currency (1 unit of transaction currency = X units of default currency).

members.name: blockedAmount
members.description: The amount of the account's balance that has been blocked/reserved by the bank for a specific purpose or as a security measure.

constantValues: The amount of the account's balance that has been blocked/reserved by the bank for a specific purpose or as a security measure.

members.name: blockedamount_Base
members.description: Value of the blocked amount in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the blocked amount in base currency.

members.name: blockedAmount_default
members.description: Blocked amount converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Blocked amount converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: dateoflasttransaction
members.description: The date on which the last transaction on the account was made.

constantValues: The date on which the last transaction on the account was made.

members.name: delinquencyStatus
members.description: Indication of whether the customer's loan is delinquent or not (that is, whether any payments are overdue).

constantValues: Indication of whether the customer's loan is delinquent or not (that is, whether any payments are overdue).

members.name: financialHoldingCategory
members.description: The category of the financial holding (Accounts, Long-term savings, Investments, Loans and Lines or credit).

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.name: financialHoldingCategory_display

constantValues: The category of the financial holding (Accounts, Long-term savings, Investments, Loans and Lines or credit).

members.name: financialHoldingType
members.description: Type of financial account (checking, savings, other).

supportingAttribute.name: financialHoldingType_display

constantValues: Type of financial account (checking, savings, other).

members.name: integrationKey
members.description: Used by the system integrator to uniquely define the data record .

constantValues: Used by the system integrator to uniquely define the data record .

members.name: interestrate
members.description: The rate of interest applied to the financial holding, to be earned during a defined period/term.

constantValues: The rate of interest applied to the financial holding, to be earned during a defined period/term.

members.name: interestType
members.description: The type of interest applied to the loan: fixed, periodical, floating, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.name: interestType_display

members.name: numberoftransactions
members.description: Number of transactions that occurred in the last month.

constantValues: Number of transactions that occurred in the last month.

members.name: unclearedBalance
members.description: The amount of money in pending transactions which have not yet been credited to the account, such as deposited checks that have not yet cleared.

constantValues: The amount of money in pending transactions which have not yet been credited to the account, such as deposited checks that have not yet cleared.

members.name: unclearedbalance_Base
members.description: Value of the uncleared balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the uncleared balance in base currency.

members.name: unclearedBalance_default
members.description: Uncleared balance converted to default currency of the system.

constantValues: Uncleared balance converted to default currency of the system.

members.name: balanceDisplayValue
members.description: Display value shows the balance of a financial holding in accordance with the type of the financial holding. Financial holdings that are typically defined as a customer's liabilities (such as lines of credit and loans) are presented as positive when the customer owes money to the financial institution (that is, a loan with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500). In the inverse case: the display value will be negative for debit balances on a credit financial holding (such as overpayment of a credit card), or overdrawn account.

constantValues: Display value shows the balance of a financial holding in accordance with the type of the financial holding. Financial holdings that are typically defined as a customer's liabilities (such as lines of credit and loans) are presented as positive when the customer owes money to the financial institution (that is, a loan with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500). In the inverse case: the display value will be negative for debit balances on a credit financial holding (such as overpayment of a credit card), or overdrawn account.

members.name: balancedisplayvalue_Base
members.description: Value of the balance display value in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the balance display value in base currency.
